input: Olympic Games postponed due to pandemic

## Olympic Games postponed due to pandemic

The International Olympic Committee (IOC) has decided to postpone the 2024 Summer Olympics in Paris until 2028 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. The decision was announced on February 21, 2021.

This is the second postponement of the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled for July 23 to August 8, 2020 but were delayed to August 24 to September 11, 2021 due to a lack of vaccines and other health concerns.
